definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Aida is the story of a Nubian princess.
sentences.chinese: 《阿伊達》是關於一位努比亞公主的故事。

sentences.english: This has led to tension between Nubians.
sentences.chinese: 這導致努比亞人之間的緊張關係。

sentences.english: This statue was found in Temple T at Kawa , in Upper Nubia.
sentences.chinese: 這座雕像被發現在廟由T佤，在上努比亞。

sentences.english: Anthropologists know the Nubians were skilled brewers.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家們都知道努比亞人造啤酒的經驗豐富。

sentences.english: At last, talking about the historical position of Nubian Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 最後對努比亞王朝在古代埃及史上的地位進行評價。

sentences.english: But the Nubians were pushed back all the way to Memphis.
sentences.chinese: 但是努比亞人被一路打退到孟菲斯。
